pages.text: $(item)Hevea Trees$() are found in the wilderness. Strip its barks with your axe, use 5 $(item)Sticks$() on the $(item)Stripped Hevea Log$(), then place $(item)Tree Tap$() (click the sticks) and put a $(item)Bowl$() on the sticks. After some time, the $(item)Bowl$() will fill up with resin, which you can gather with your hand.
